text:
League 1
PSG / ASM: a Monegasque approaching?
Paris Saint-Germain would closely follow Russian international ASM Aleksandr Golovin. However, it would not be one of the priorities of the next transfer window.
04 Nov 2019, 22:40 by Charlie Creteur



The club of the capital strengthened its environment during the summer mercato 2019! With the arrival of Ander Herrera, Idrissa Gueye or even Pablo Sarabia sometimes positioned in the middle, Thomas Tuchel is better armed to this post unlike last year. However, the PSG would continue to monitor possible recruits to this position so some issues of Ligue 1.




Golovin targeted by the PSG?




Aleksandr Golovin + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to information from the Russian sports media Sport 24, the PSG would follow Monaco midfielder Aleksandr Golovin. In 10 Ligue 1 games this season, the 23-year-old has 2 goals and 2 assists and is less in trouble than last year. However, it would only be a simple interest and not a priority.
